title: Establishes the New York certified retirement community program within the office for the aging
summary: Establishes the New York certified retirement community program within the office for the aging; provides for certification by the director of the office for the aging that a community is advantageous for retirees to live and that such community encourages retirees to reside therein; upon certification the office for the aging shall provide assistance to the community.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to establishing a program to encourage retirees to make their homes in New York state
